After sign informed consent , patient receive hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HSCT ) relate , haploidentical donor , follow infusion ATIR 28 32 day HSCT ( later require patient 's medical condition ) . Patients receive ATIR single infusion dose 2x10E6 viable T-cells/kg . All patient treat ATIR follow 12 month HSCT . Assessments perform weekly visit day ATIR infusion 8 week ATIR infusion , monthly visit 3 6 month HSCT , every 2 month 6 12 month HSCT , every 6 month 12 24 month HSCT .
